knowledge.text:
[b]Section 3: Free Clothing[/b]

[b]Charity[/b]
The Salvation Army has been known to let folks get some clothes.

[b]Donate and Give Back[/b]
If the clothes are over a year old and you will never wear them again, it is time to give back to society. Someone, somewhere could use your old clothes.

[b]Shoplifting[/b]
To steal from a brother or sister is evil. To not steal from the institutions that are the pillars of the Pig Empire is equally immoral.
